```{bash}
#revert: probably the best option for changing versions
#have to name the version you want to reverse
git revert HEAD --no-edit
#go back a few commits, revert back a few commits, eg:
git revert HEAD
git revert HEAD~1
git revert HEAD~2
#etc
```
